mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) from ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid LEFT join ht_borrow_tender AS t on br.tender_id=t.id

SELECT SUM(br.recover_capital) AS recoverCapital, SUM(br.recover_interest) AS recoverInterest, SUM(br.recover_Account) AS recoverAccount, SUM(br.recover_fee) AS recoverFee from ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid LEFT join ht_borrow_tender AS t on br.tender_id=t.id

SELECT br.nid AS nid, br.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, u1.user_id AS userId, u1.username AS borrowUserName, hbi.name AS borrowName, hbi.repay_org_name as repayOrgName, b.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, b.project_Type AS projectType, bpt.borrow_name AS projectTypeName, b.borrow_Period AS borrowPeriod, b.borrow_Apr AS borrowApr, b.account AS borrowAccount, b.borrow_account_yes AS borrowAccountYes, bs.name AS repayType, u2.user_id AS recoverUserId, u2.username AS recoverUserName, u2.attribute AS recover_user_attribute, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od6`.`name` ELSE `od3`.`name` END `recover_region_name`, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od5`.`name` ELSE `od2`.`name` END `recover_branch_name`, CASE WHEN u2.attribute = '1' THEN `od4`.`name` ELSE `od`.`name` END `recover_department_name`, u3.username AS referrer_name, u3.user_id AS referrer_user_id, u3.truename AS referrer_true_name, `od6`.`name` AS `referrer_region_name`, `od5`.`name` AS `referrer_branch_name`, `od4`.`name` AS `referrer_department_name`, br.recover_period AS recoverPeriod, t.account AS recoverTotal, br.recover_capital AS recoverCapital, br.recover_interest AS recoverInterest, br.recover_Account AS recoverAccount, br.recover_fee AS recoverFee, br.recover_capital_yes AS recoverCapitalYes, br.recover_interest_yes AS recoverInterestYes, br.recover_Account_yes AS recoverAccountYes, br.recover_capital-br.recover_capital_yes AS recoverCapitalWait, br.recover_interest-br.recover_interest_yes AS recoverInterestWait, br.recover_Account-br.recover_Account_yes AS recoverAccountWait, br.recover_status AS status, if(b.repay_last_time='' OR b.repay_last_time='0' OR b.repay_last_time='null','',FROM_UNIXTIME( b.repay_last_time, '%Y-%m-%d' )) AS recoverLastTime, if(br.recover_yestime is null or br.recover_yestime='', '',FROM_UNIXTIME(br.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' )) as repayActionTime, br.repay_ordid AS repay_ordid, br.repay_batch_no AS repay_batch_no, hic.inst_name AS instName, b.plan_nid, IFNULL(flg.order_id,rflg.order_id) AS freezeOrderId, b.repay_account_all as repayAccountAll, b.repay_account_capital as repayAccountCapital, b.repay_account_interest as repayAccountInterest, b.borrow_manager as borrowManager, br.charge_days as chargeDays, br.repay_charge_interest-br.charge_interest as jianxi, br.charge_interest as chargeInterest, br.late_days as lateDays, br.late_interest as lateInterest, CASE brr.repay_money_source WHEN 1 THEN '借款人还款' WHEN 2 THEN '机构垫付' WHEN 3 THEN '保证金垫付' ELSE '借款人还款' END as repayMoneySource, brr.repay_username as repayUsername, CASE brr.auto_repay when 0 then '手动还款' else '自动还款' end as autoRepay, ba.submitter as submitter FROM ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi ON hbi.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT join ht_borrow_tender AS t on br.tender_id=t.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = CAST(b.project_type AS CHAR) LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u1 ON br.borrow_userid = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u2 ON br.user_id = u2.user_id
LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou` ON `ou`.hyd_id = br.user_id AND ou.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od` ON `od`.`id` = `ou`.`departmentid` AND `od`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od2` ON `od2`.`id` = `od`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od3` ON `od3`.`id` = `od2`.`parentid`
LEFT JOIN ht_r_user AS u3 ON u2.spreads_user_id = u3.user_id LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_users `ou1` ON `ou1`.hyd_id = u2.spreads_user_id AND ou1.user_status IN ('E','Q1','Q11','Q2','Q21') LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od4` ON `od4`.`id` = `ou1`.`departmentid` AND `od4`.id IS NOT NULL LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od5` ON `od5`.`id` = `od4`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_r_oa_department `od6` ON `od6`.`id` = `od5`.`parentid` LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = hbi.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_org_freeze_log flg on flg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and flg.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg on rflg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and rflg.del_flag = 0 Left join ht_borrow_apicron ba on br.borrow_nid=ba.borrow_nid and br.recover_period=ba.period_now and ba.api_type='1' left join ht_borrow_repay brr on brr.borrow_nid=br.borrow_nid and br.recover_period=brr.repay_period
ORDER BY br.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(1) from ht_borrow AS b INNER JOIN ht_borrow_info AS binfo ON binfo.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_borrow_recover AS br ON br.borrow_nid=b.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style AS bs on b.borrow_style=bs.nid LEFT join ht_borrow_tender AS t on br.tender_id=t.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_project_type bpt ON bpt.borrow_cd = binfo.project_type LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_inst_config hic ON hic.inst_code = binfo.inst_code LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_org_freeze_log flg on flg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and flg.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN ht_bank_repay_freeze_log rflg on rflg.borrow_nid = b.borrow_nid and rflg.del_flag = 0
ORDER BY br.id DESC
